Browse DataSocket Method

Short Name: Browse DataSocket

Requires: Base Development System (Windows)

Class: Application Methods

To Use: Create a method.

Launches the DataSocket Browser dialog box to establish a connection to a DataSocket item.

Parameters

Data typeNameRequiredDescription
PromptNoSpecifies the title of the DataSocket Browser dialog box. The default is Browse for DataSocket Item.
Selected URLNoURL of the connection specified by the user in the DataSocket Browser dialog box.

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this method.

Data typeNo return value
Available in Run-Time EngineYes (Read/Write)
Available in Real-Time Operating SystemYes
Remote access allowedNo
